item.description:
The WMPG interview listed here was moved up from Oct 8 to September 25, by station request, so many people were not able to catch the show. We will include a link when WMPG archives the show for listeners to download.

Chip Edgar, host of WMPG's Sound Ecology will interview Alastair Lough and Pat Proulx-Lough of The Transition Center in Portland Maine, on Transition Towns in the US and UK, and how this grassroots movement aims to tackle Peak Oil and Climate Change directly, to increase local resilience, and restore community within our cities and towns.

The show will air on WMPG in Portland, Maine at 7:30 PM on Wednesday, October 8th.

WMPG can be found on your FM dial at 90.9 or 104.1.
item.name: EVENT MOVED to SEPT. 25!!! Can't relist it. Transition Towns Interview on WMPG
